name: Retro Kostki
description:
You are trapped inside a mysterious world where nothing makes any logical sense... Is it even possible to escape from this limbo?

Controls:
  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Scroll Wheel - Adjust mouse sensitivity
  • Left Mouse Button - Advance text
  • Escape - Exit game
Cheats:
  • F6 - Quick save
  • F7 - Load game

Made for the Untitled Game Jam #52 in C++ and OpenGL.
